nodes.text: Foerost was a terrestrial world where the Drabatan Pao carried out a demolitions job which involved taking out a communications tower sometime by the year 0 BBY. Captain Cassian Andor remembered this shortly before the Battle of Scarif that year, where the captain's team carried out a similar job. Andor thought to himself that he would ask Pao about the job before the mission began. The Imperial Captain Tabor Seitaron participated in a battle at Foerost at some by the year 3 ABY. While showing Seitaron around the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Herald that year, an Imperial ensign commented on how the Herald's ten percent increase in efficiency might have been useful at the Battle of Foerost.

Foerost was first mentioned in the 2015 canon novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed. Foerost originally appeared in the Star Wars Legends comic book Tales of the Jedi: The Sith War 1: Edge of the Whirlwind, which was written by Kevin J. Anderson and published by Dark Horse Comics on August 15, 1995.
